name: Mallow Technologies Private Limited
description:
At Mallow, we strive at providing services with the best solution to our customers. We research, analyze, solve, design and develop. We work along with our customers in applying technology in the most innovative way for the emerging business needs.
We offer services in developing Web, iOS and Android applications. We serve as an one stop solution, where we analyse your requirements and design a solution involving all or any of these three major domains.
We are a passionate, purpose-led group of people who work as an integrated whole on creating attractive and user friendly mobile and web apps. Programming is more than just work for us, it is what we love doing and every finished app (mobile/web) is a manifestation of passion, creativity and intelligence.
We pride ourselves with the fact that our sense for coding/programming is at par with those who work at big time agencies. Our advantage is that we understand how individuals, small, medium businesses operate and that we relate on how challenging start ups can be.
